question: 19th edition of TOONZ Animation Masters Summit was held in ___________, Kerala.
explanation: 19th edition of TOONZ Animation Masters Summit was held in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala on 4th and 5th May, 2018. The summit was organised by Toonz Media Group. It provided information about new trends in animation domain with an objective to inspire creators to use modern technology and take advantage of fresh opportunities. During the Summit, V G Samant, pioneer of Indian animation and creator was honoured with the 'Legend of Animation' award for his contributions to the animation industry. Nearly, 400 individuals associated with animation and media industry in India and abroad, attended this summit.
